resources.string: Welcome to Trailblazer Fitness. Here you will find info about all our outdoor bootcamps, indoor classes and stair running groups. We promote that fitness is for everyone. You are not too old or too big to get fit. All of our classes are suitable for everyone. They are fun and friendly and they get you results to lose body fat, get you super fit, and feeling amazing. All classes vary from outdoor fitness to indoor thai boxing fitness classes. We have something for everyone and everyone is welcome.
An image of the TrailBlazer Time Table. This looks like a bulletin board with pieces of paper pinned to it. Each paper has details about a different class that TrailBlazers does.
